name: Shivneri Fort
description: Shivneri Fort is a prominent hill fort celebrated as the birthplace of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. It holds immense historical significance and features well-preserved fortifications, temples, water cisterns, and bastions overlooking the Junnar region. Offering panoramic views of the Sahyadri mountains, the trek to Shivneri is relatively easy and widely frequented by history enthusiasts and trekkers alike.

startingPoint.name: Junnar Town
startingPoint.description: Junnar town is the main base for visiting Shivneri Fort, providing accommodation, food, and transport facilities. The road connects well to the fort's base village, making the trek accessible.
